item.title: Create a page list
item.description: Before we can convert this baby to an EPUB 3, we need to create what’s called a “Page list”. A page list is exactly what it sounds like - a list of all the pages (or, “page breaks”) in the book. Of course, as EPUB is reflowable (page-less), these pages correspond to pages in the print edition. Therefore the page list allows users in mixed print-digital environments, such as classrooms and book clubs, to coordinate their reading.
